vocabinfos.mediumDef:
cubit-a measure of distance (the forearm), roughly 18 in (. 5m). There are several cubits used in the OT, the cubit of a man or common cubit (De 3:11), the legal cubit or cubit of the sanctuary (Eze 40:5) plus others. See a Bible Dictionary for a complete treatment.
Aramaic equivalent: am.mah (אַמָּה "cubit" H0521)
§ cubit-a measure of distance (the forearm), roughly 18 in (. 5m). There are several cubits used in the OT, the cubit of a man or common cubit (De 3:11), the legal cubit or cubit of the sanctuary (Eze 40:5) plus others. See a Bible Dictionary for a complete treatment.
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (ordinario) codo: medida lineal de 44.5 cm (24 dedos, 6 palmos menores, 2 palmos); (real) codo: medida lineal de 51.81 cm (7 palmos menores); (2)   colina
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
肘(腕尺) 一測量距離的量度 (前臂), 粗略是18英吋 (半公尺).
在舊約有數種腕尺被使用, 人肘或一般腕尺 (申 3:11),
法律用腕尺或聖殿的腕尺 (結 40:5)加上別種的
請參看聖經字典找完整的敘述
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
肘(腕尺) 一测量距离的量度 (前臂), 粗略是18英吋 (半公尺).
在旧约有数种腕尺被使用, 人肘或一般腕尺 (申 3:11),
法律用腕尺或圣殿的腕尺 (结 40:5)加上别种的
请参看圣经字典找完整的叙述
